name: Save the Cat
description:
A cat got into a pickle with some aliens, and now needs your help.

Keep the cat alive from uncertain danger, with no other than fire bullets!

In the Demo, there is only one stage available, with one kind of enemy,  3 power ups, and 2 characters!

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46, and may contain bugs.(I haven't experienced any with this version, but I'm the creator)

=Controls=

W,A,S,D- Move

Space- Shoot

ESC- Exit
